name: Andal Uy Ampatuan Jr.
issues: Convicted mass murderer; main perpetrator of the 2009 Maguindanao massacre
57 counts of murder; sentenced to reclusion perpetua; currently incarcerated at New Bilibid Prison
21 counts of violations of the Anti-Graft and Corrupt Practices Act
Anomalous procurement and ghost delivery of fuel for infrastructure projects in Maguindanao (2008)
professional_background: Began government career in the 1970s during Martial Law as police chief
